title: doblezero
author: doblezero
content: SPECTACULAR AUCTION OF THIS SATORI CHIP BITFLYER BLUE(BitFlyer is one of the largest Bitcoin exchanges in Japan)STARTING BID: 0.025 BTC With minimum increments of: 0.001 BTCURGENT SHIPPING: Not included. Shipping will be based on location and preference (shipping from Spain)   END DATE AND TIME: Time until Monday, October 17, 2022, 16:00:00 (New York time)Sniping: Bids in the last 10 minutes extend the auction to a maximum of 10 minutes after the last bid.Other:Payment due within 24 hours of auction end.Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.
